website_summaries.verdict: These grapefruit spoons have subtle serration around the entire bowl to give you extra cutting surface.
pros: Serrated grapefruit spoons in a 4-piece set
18/10 stainless steel with a high-polish finish
Spoon and handle are comfortable and functional
Very subtle serration around the whole bowl
cons: Some find the serrations to be too dull to cut into the grapefruit

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by the quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with these little spoons, considering how inexpensive they are. They don't feel cheap or flimsy at all, they actually have a little bit of heft to them for their size. And they haven't tarnished or rusted or started to get dull either. I got them for use with espresso cups and they're perfect, and another reviewer mentioned using them for baby food as well because they're not just the perfect size but also perfectly smooth. Whatever you use them for, I think you'll be pleased with them too.
customer_reviews.author: Leo LeonardTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: These Spoons Are Extra Long
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great, very high quality. You get four extra long spoons securely attached to carboard packaging. Be advised, they are longer than most "iced tea spoons" ( This product here has an extra long stem handle with a regular sized (almost smaller) spoon at the end. I was looking for regular-sized iced tea spoons, which are longer than regular teaspoons and soup spoons. For some reason, stores don't want to stock regular sized iced tea spoons. They only want to stock standard-sized table teaspoons (similar length as a soup spoon, for example). In general, longer spoons like iced tea spoons are really handy for serving things from regular sized jars without getting your fingers and hands all sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Banana for scale.
customer_reviews.text: Do not underestimate how tiny these are. All the reviews warn you, but maybe you're like me and you think, "I am looking for small tongs so this is good." These are not small tongs. These are miniscule tongs. Doll sized. What a tweezers could be if they were blunt and ambitious. Tongs for ants. I got these for gummy bears, figuring if they were too small I would find another use for them. But there is no other use. If you need tongs this size you are a surgeon or scientist and they make more official looking pinchy type tools. Anyway I am posting a picture with a banana for scale.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Little Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I knew these were going to be small but they were even smaller than I expected. They are well made and the 18/10 stainless steel is easy to clean and maintain. They have stayed shiny and polished after months of use. I'm very happy to have added them to my silverware collection. They also turned out to be way more useful than I expected. They are the perfect size for tasting, small desserts, espresso, condiments, baby food, and etc. I'm glad I bought three sets. I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Copy cat sisters
customer_reviews.text: A sister lamented that she couldn't find iced tea spoons. After finding none in stores, I found these at Amazon. and ordered a dozen for her. I already had 18 old iced tea spoons, but added four more just for me to evaluate. Afterward, I ordered eight more for me. Another sister asked where I found them, then she ordered a supply for herself. We love the extra long handles and small bowl. It facilitates dipping into narrow mouth bottles, etc. After owning them for a few years, we still love them. They are a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Gennie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These go great with our little espresso set that we got for our percolator. It stirs perfectly in out espresso cups and is proportionate to the size of the cups. We usually hand wash them because they are so tiny and don't want them to get lost in the dishwasher, so I wouldn't know how well they last being washed in the dishwasher. I would definitely recommend them to anyone looking for a great addition to their espresso cup and plate set. Or even for a little girls tea party. These would also make a perfect little spoon for baby feeding. The edges are not sharp, and the spoon would hold just the right amount for a baby's bite.
customer_reviews.author: ssp

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice tongs. They're attractive, well-made and functional. They were slightly smaller than I anticipated. The dimensions listed for the product state 4"; however, they measure at just under 3-3/4". Which is really no big deal. I have used them for veggies and dip, fruit, and small appetizers. It's always good to have a nice pair of small serving tongs on hand for those little items for which you don't want to bring out the 10" serving tongs, and these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Decker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mini tongs
customer_reviews.text: My morning ritual involves a personal sized pot of tea (Harney & Sons Scottish Morn), sugar cubes, and cold milk. I already had the cute dish of sugar cubes, but I figured I shouldn't be fondling all the sugar cubes. These tongs are perfect. I'm not sure they would work well for anything much larger than a shortbread cookie.
customer_reviews.author: KitchenNette

customer_reviews.title: They Work!
customer_reviews.text: The serrated edge did not seem like it would work, but I gave it a try anyway. To my surprise these spoons cut through grapefruit effortlessly and they do not cut your mouth. They are very comfortable to eat with. I love these spoons for eating grapefruit. I no longer have to cut the grapefruit prior to eating. If you enjoy eating grapefruit, I highly recommend these spoons. I've included photos of the spoon dimensions in this review.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for baby spoons, they are the perfect size! We fed our 5 1/2 month old cereal with them tonight and the bowl is the perfect size for her little mouth. Nice weight, not flimsy, very polished and super cute! And being stainless, should last long enough to use for grandkids someday!
customer_reviews.author: mom2two

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These may not be "fine silverware" but they're quite fine enough. Features: **Five inches long **Made in Vietnam **Polished stainless steel **Clean, modern design **Even though little, they're strong and not bend-able **Pointy enough to spear a melon ball, shrimp, mussel, or get that hidey escargot out of its shell **But not so sharp that a fork would pierce your hand (experimentally, even with a lot of pressure) **Look elegant in a place setting
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Love Tiny Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these little spoons. I bought these because my teenager and me like to eat snacks with small spoons. The snack takes longer to finish up and we have a set of good quality spoons we can use. They are tiny spoons; like baby Gerber spoons, but they are beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: These are not made of 18/10 stainless steel!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are listed as being made of 18/10 grade stainless steel. 18/10 stainless steel has nickel in it which makes the metal composition non-magnetic. I put a magnet to these and it stuck. So it seems these are not made with food quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE BASICASLLY TINY FORKS
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows 6, but if you read the description, you only get 4. But I realized that from the get go. I wasn't sure how big these were, they are a little smaller than I had hoped, as I really wanted small seafood forks, but all the actual seafood forks are those picks that come with the crackers, etc. I wanted actual forks. These will do, they are 5 inches from tine tip to handle tip. The tines are 3/4 inches long and the tips are 1/4 inch apart, as pictured, 2 tines per fork. They are bright stainless steel. Hope this helps you..
customer_reviews.author: DabuckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, good size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for fishing olives out of the jar. They work perfectly for that purpose. They are well made, shiny and smooth. The only negative is that I have to hand wash them because they are too tiny to fit in the utensil rack of the dishwasher. They slip right through if I try to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Yummo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! No problems
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence purchasing these, but I've already used them twice and they've gone through the dishwasher. So far so good! No problems! I wish I had bought these AGES ago. My parents donated 4 gold plated spoons that I stupidly ran through the dishwasher - WITH A BOOSTER, no less, which ruined the finish. Now they look old and crappy. THESE, however, are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Vader D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Spoons That Stand the Test of Time
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for Christmas in 2011 to go with his new espresso machine. It is now 2 and half years later and I am finally getting around to writing a review. These spoons have held up amazingly. We strictly use the dishwasher and hardly, if ever, hand wash. These spoons have shown no sign of dulling or change from repetitive visits to the dishwasher. Additionally there are no dents or scratches on these spoons after this long. They really are a quality product that is worth much more than the $7 we paid for them. The spoons are perfect size for espresso and would be far too small for cappuccino or any other coffees.
customer_reviews.author: KristenB

customer_reviews.title: Use them to get into horseradish jar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased them in November 2014. I forgot the original purpose. They are excellent to get into narrow jars like horseradish that I eat with tuna fish. The spoons look the same as the day I received them. I decided to buy another set (in case I get behind in washing the dishes or in case they stop selling them!)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Daze

customer_reviews.title: So cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: I had an idea and this little beauty fit the bill. I love using laundry pods but I hate the way they feel. Mini tongs to the rescue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but very light and feel cheap.
customer_reviews.text: They are nice looking, but feel light weight and very cheap in hand. I have included a picture with another brand (ONUBU) . While they do look nice, I choose solid any day of the week and twice on Sunday.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I received my set today. They came exactly as advertised, but were even better quality than I had anticipated. These are restaurant-quality weight (strong) and are very well made with a beautiful polished finish. I would buy more if I needed to, so I feel comfortable giving them a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bill R.

customer_reviews.title: Paddle Paddle!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for cool little spoons for a while! These paddles rock! I got a Nespresso machine for Christmas and I had since been looking for fairly unique and not overly-priced demitasse spoons. The ones at Crate and Barrel were too plain and boring and the ones at the Nespresso store were waaaaay too overpriced! Until I got these, I had been using chop sticks to stir my espresso, but alas, I'd found the perfect spoon. They totally serve the basic purpose of...stirring, or should I say PADDLING, the sugar in my cup of espresso. They are a perfect fit for any espresso cup!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Glad i saw these on my list of things to review so i can order some more of them. i am a huge fan of dessert spoons and hadn't had any around in a long time but took a chance on these. The photo doesn't do them justice, they are nice quality, as others have said, and they are holding up well. I use them to stir my coffee in my tall mugs in the morning so my fingers don't get burned, and to eat dessert (obviously) in the evenings. They are a nice weight and satisfying to hold. Not cheap at all, great price. I love these spoons!
customer_reviews.author: GHF

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of WMF in general, and already had the set for this specific line. I got these to match and did not regret, they look beautiful and elegant. I would recommend the whose set of this line.
customer_reviews.author: Thais B

customer_reviews.title: Cute little espresso or dip spoons!
customer_reviews.text: While in Europe, we were introduced to the glory that is espresso. Tiny cup, tiny coffee, and yes, tiny spoon. We loved the tiny spoons. So, from a cafe in Paris on the Champs Elysees, we added these little guys to the cart and found them on our doorstep upon return. We now love getting a little dose of Paris memories with our morning coffee. They are sturdy and appear to be of good quality. We also think they'll make pretty good spoons for dips. :)
customer_reviews.author: Phoeden

customer_reviews.title: Great safe baby spoons!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THESE SPOONS!!! I bought one pack initially and then a second pack thereafter. Note that each pack only contains 4 spoons, not 6. I bought these spoons to use as baby spoons because I didn't want to use plastic spoons for my baby given all the concerns about bad chemicals leaking from plastic items. These are a perfect size for baby's mouth as well as for baby hands - she constantly tries to grab and 'feed' herself with these spoons. They are also a great size for travel/outside dining. I would highly recommend these spoons for babies!
customer_reviews.author: Truffle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved the idea of these spoons... however it did not take much to bend them.
customer_reviews.author: TwinMom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I purchased them. I own other WFM Flatware. Good quality and they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Hue De Laroque

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Always hesitant to buy some things online because you can't hold it in your hands and get a feel for the weight of it or really inspect it closely. However I was NOT disappointed with this purchase. The spoons have a good weight, balanced feel and are very nice looking. I purchased these for Ice Coffee, and such and they work great. Also like that the slender handle that is not so slender that it will fall through the opening in the silverware basket in the dishwasher. Will be purchasing more of these spoons.
customer_reviews.author: L. DeMaio

customer_reviews.title: Could Be Sharper
customer_reviews.text: The serrations are not very visible from the front side of the spoon but are more obvious from the back. The quality of the material is good but the very tip of the spoon is not as sharp as I would like. I have a different set of two with a very knifelike tip but did not reorder those because the handle has yellow plastic covers which have become scratched and loose after many uses and washing is dishwasher. This spoon is not bad but could be better with a sharper tip. I think it will not deteriorate from use and dishwashing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Life saver in the morning
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting inside those coffee rations which have a small or tiny mouth opening. Thank goodness the spoon is just big enough to prevent itself from going-falling down my kitchen sink drain, be careful, watch out for that, if you order this, hold on to it and do a little test to ensure it does not fit down your drain.
customer_reviews.author: B. by the Water

customer_reviews.title: Just as they look in the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I have two tall coffee cups and I could never find these kind of spoons in the stores. I finally looked for them on Amazon and found several brands but chose these ones. They are just as they look in the picture. Very sturdy brand and tall enough to not dip my fingers in the cup while stirring my sugar. They are very well made and no chance of corroding/rusting as some cheap brands. They have a shinny look too that is not disturbed by the dish washer. I am sure they would work for different purposes.... so go for them if you need some.
customer_reviews.author: NatureLover

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cute esp for fruit
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this because I chop up strawberries and do a little Ghiradelli chocolate dipping sauce often, especially when I am trying to watch my weight. I am a big fan of the WMF Manaos line, I also own the grapefruit spoons, and hope to own the entire collection. All the utensils still sparkle. It's these little mundane activities that can have a little more sparkle, can cheer up your day.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Roboto

customer_reviews.title: Love shape and size
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and size of these paddles. Nice addition to the coffee supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Throckmorton

customer_reviews.title: Well made and designed.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to go with the 30 Oz. Malt Cup Stainless Steel Milkshake Ice Cream Mixer containers (recommended for the purchase). They help complete the presentation! Design is simple, but elegant and feel nicely when held. These are quality spoons. You can also use these for hard to reach areas in jars. The spoon size isn't too small, as some other reviewers suggested. They are smaller than a standard teaspoon size, but definitely work. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth F.

customer_reviews.title: Team Little Spoon!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little spoons. They are perfect and the exact thing I needed. Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and exactly as pictured...but very small !
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for not reading the dimensions, but WOW These are so small. I'd say they're great strictly for espresso, tiny kitchen tasks, and working on your portion control while eating ice cream... but, if like me, you are looking at these thinking they're teaspoon size, you are dead wrong. Dead wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Maeve O.

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles
customer_reviews.text: These paddles are really great. Much higher quality than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite awesome. They are smooth and easy to handle, nothing fancy. I wanted a small size like this and they are just right.
customer_reviews.author: redbox40

customer_reviews.title: Handy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, good weight, sturdy, and are great for sundaes and things that are hard to dig out, like olives. We also use to keep tea bags sunk in glasses. Nice addition to silverware.
customer_reviews.author: ntech1

customer_reviews.title: Delightful
customer_reviews.text: I know this is ridiculous but, eating a fine ice cream is my big thing and these fine spoons make it a ritual of eating a delicacy. It makes eating ice cream or for that matter ANYTHING very special. You would think that Jony Ive of Apple had designed these they are so nice. I smile inside when I eat with one of these spoons. Good shape, heft and design. All that for such a simple thing as a ... Spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these as a gift and the recipient loved them, washed them and began using them immediately
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift and the recipient loved them, washed them and began using them immediately. The "spoon" portion is slightly smaller than my iced tea spoons, but still usable for mixing iced tea. The packaging was not desirable (a flimsy dusty and thin "open" plastic bag) so I created my own since it was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Silent Witness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall dessert glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These little spoons are just the right length for my Bormioli Rocco Rock Bar Dessert Glasses I also purchased on Amazon. They are small dessert spoons, so if you are looking for something a teaspoon size or larger, these might not be what you are looking for. I like the contemporary looking style.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Double duty spoons - nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I've just placed my second order of these. We use them for iced tea, ice cream floats, etc. Put them in the dishwasher and have held up well for almost a year. Really great for eating right out of a pint...doesn't get your knuckles messy:) Can't beat the price compared to similar spoons here.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how they’re described! Quick ship!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what i need them for, exactly how they were described!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect for what it's meant to be used as.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we were looking for when we have our ice cream floats!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gee

customer_reviews.title: Minute and cheap.
customer_reviews.text: WMF price but certainly not WMF standard. Price tag of goods made in Germany but made in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: F. Leal

customer_reviews.title: watching Once Upon a Time and crying your eyes out like a 13 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Lovely spoons for entertaining or just being fancy on the couch with Ben and Jerry, watching Once Upon a Time and crying your eyes out like a 13 year old girl. Long story short...these are good spoons. They make ice cream happen from a respectable distance from your hand. That last bite at the bottom of a soda glass?...yeah, it won't know what hit it. Boom....ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a paddle for making lattes and these are much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Espresso Spoons 4ct
customer_reviews.text: These are soo cute! Bought them to accompany some small Cappuccino cups I bought for hot cocoa and tea with my kids. They are the perfect size. I would warn you though they can drop down into the disposal drain quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cools

customer_reviews.title: under average
customer_reviews.text: These aren't nice like a small espresso spoon I have. I bought them based on seeing 4.5 star rating but sadly they are plain, cheap and very basic. Nothing I would have bought had I seen them in person.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but very functional
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to stick my fingers in everything I needed to stir in a tall glass. I had looked for long handled tea spoons, but with no luck. I found these on Amazon and they work very well. The bowl is smaller that a regular teaspoon, but that's ok....the handle is long enough that I don't have to get my fingers in the drinks. I have retired the butter knife I had used for stirring the tall glasses!
customer_reviews.author: retdatlast

customer_reviews.title: it can be bent easily so don't use it to scoop ice-cream from the ...
customer_reviews.text: it can be bent easily so don't use it to scoop ice-cream from the container. Use a real ice-cream scoop for that purpose. This is great for reaching in narrow opening bottle. I used it to scoop out honey.
customer_reviews.author: Kin P. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: It brings out the Magpie in me when I gaze upon these highly polished stainless steel tiny little Espresso Spoons. Whenever I start to make an Espresso drink I naturally reach for the shinyest of the spoons in my collection. Shhhh, don't tell anyone, but I once used one of these little beauties in a cappuccino ! I felt so decadent doing that... muahhhahahaha
customer_reviews.author: L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, fit inside our sugar cube container. elegant looking, well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: twix

customer_reviews.title: Lovely & elegant, very high quality stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on a whim and so glad I did! They are really high quality, gorgeous and shiny, and great for eating ice cream because you get small bites. We also use them to stir coffee and will probably use them for ice cream in the summer. At $13 for four spoons they are such a nice little addition to our silverware drawer.
customer_reviews.author: ABF

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality..!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for spoons that would add some simple elegance to our old style parfait glasses when serving... I was very pleased with the simplicity and quality. These actually have a little "heft" to them, and they're long enough for you to comfortably enjoy a bit of decadence, all the way to the bottom of our 12 oz. parfait glasses. Very nice..;~)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream, Tea, Jam... Awesome TALL spoons.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 last year and in fact, it is not enough for a daily use (jam for breakfast or tea). The design is simple but not need for more, it looks nice on my brunch table or for dessert. I like these spoons because the "round part" is smaller than most of American spoons, it is more elegant to my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Shiny, plain demitasse spoons
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I reviewed these already, but Amazon wants me to do it again. These are demitasse spoons for espresso or if you need a small spoon for tea or a sugar container. No pattern that go well with pretty much any coffee/tea set, from classic Euro, to Asian, or modern plain.
customer_reviews.author: someguy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very basic packaging, it might damage the fork. and this fork is made in Vietnam
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are a little longer than I expected/hoped (I'm just bad with measurements, so though they were provided by seller, I can't ever know for sure until I have an item in my hand), but they still get the job done. I like using smaller spoons for regular everyday eating and these work well. Very good quality & weight.
customer_reviews.author: 🌸The Vu Family🌸

customer_reviews.title: Little Powerhouse Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Quality item. Small but powerful, a nice tight spring, that will not drop what is grabbed, so long as you hold on. They're good-looking, a nice clean design, and they do the job. Glad to have them.
customer_reviews.author: Shari A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: I love these little spoons
customer_reviews.text: I love these little spoons. They are great to serve with your coffee, with condiments, and my little granddaughter loves to used them to eat with. They are very shiny and nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S.

customer_reviews.title: High quality polished spoons
customer_reviews.text: High quality polished spoons for eating the inside of the grapefruit. The serrations are just enough to cut the fruit, but not your mouth. The metal is thick enough so it does not bend when cutting the inside of the grapefruit. I am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: electonics hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Espresso Spoons
customer_reviews.text: The spoons came very quickly, they were well packaged and for the money, very high quality. They look great, they are unique and they do a great job of stiring in sugar without disturbing the crema layer. I recommend these without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Where's Godot?Top Contributor: Classic Rock

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality version of the European ice cream paddle that I love so much
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was seeing these from an aerial view...T-I-N-Y! Very high quality version of the European ice cream paddle that I love so much. Gonna use for ice cream, flans, and panna cottas so I have to take little tiny bites and make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: L Ember

customer_reviews.title: Small, fragile, but quite nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, VERY SMALL spoons. I think they are quite beautiful in a simple way. They are somewhat delicate so, if you expect them to endure any hard usage, maybe look elsewhere. Having said that, I must add that I am completely pleased and not at all sorry to have purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mini is understatement
customer_reviews.text: This is more like for pretend play! Mini is an understatement. It’s no bigger than the palm of my hand and I have very small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo C

customer_reviews.title: Quality serrated spoons that are worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.text: I searched for quite awhile before purchasing this set of grapefruit spoons. They cost more, but IMHO are worth the extra money. Made of 18/10 stainless steel, the spoons appear to be well made, have a nice heft, and feels very solid in your hand. The serrated edges are sharp enough to easily scoop out citrus fruit, without worry about cutting your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Shopper

customer_reviews.title: FOUR FORKS FOR....
customer_reviews.text: I love these little forks :) Great for escargot; anchovies; even for digging meat out of hard crabs!
customer_reviews.author: SpaCreekKid

customer_reviews.title: But they are so easy to clean as flat that you just wipe them ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little spoon. Classy, design, everybody seeing them ask me where I bought them. The only (small) downside is that they don't fit in the dishwasher as they are too small and falls under the cutlery bag. But they are so easy to clean as flat that you just wipe them after putting some water and it's done.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT Little Spoons For "Tea Time"!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these spoons today, Love Them!! They are PERFECT for stirring Tea or Coffee in delicate china cups!! Just the right size, a good weight. They seem to be well made too.
customer_reviews.author: Suesan Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very small but seem to be sturdy. Will work best for pickles and olives or ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small but seem to be sturdy. Will work best for pickles and olives or single pieces of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Use
customer_reviews.text: Requires significant effort/force to use. Lack of pliability makes this a very poor solution for most tasks tongs are used for. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joxerphile

customer_reviews.title: very meh.
customer_reviews.text: they were flimsy and dull, just didn't feel like a good spoon. bummed. I want something that feels good to hold, this is very thin, and narrow, just not awesome. will look for a better quality item to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Masha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Grapefruit Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are terrific. They are balanced, sturdy, well designed, attractive and really, really work. I was a little skeptical of the positive reviews before ordering but thought I would give them a try because I was desperate. I love to eat grapefruit. Over the years I have been victimized by my old cheap grapefruit spoon that had a wide, shallow bowl and a serrated edge that constantly sliced the side of my tongue - ouch! Talk about a deterrent. I figured that I wouldn't be out much if these spoons didn't work and could always return them. Would have been delighted with just one of these but am thrilled that I have four!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Nice product good for expresso or dopio or ...
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Wish they made a small knife/spreader to match these and the forks
customer_reviews.author: Tjp

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Like another buyer posted, these spoons are strong. You can get ice cream out of the container and not bend the spoon. I wanted some long spoons and ordered these. They are a bit too long, but that's okay. The spoon part is smaller than my other long teaspoons, but I don't care. I like them. Highly recommend these long teaspoons!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: study spoons that are perfect for milkshake glasses
customer_reviews.text: Durable, machine-washable, study spoons that are perfect for milkshake glasses, coffee drinks, and so much more. The perfect simple design that is sure to go nicely with any kitchen dinnerware. Absolutely worth the money and very helpful to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Bean & Peanut

customer_reviews.title: Ice Cream spoons
customer_reviews.text: I bought these not so much as ice cream spoons, but to stir coffee in tall travel mugs and ice tea in tall glasses. They work very well for that. I think they would work very well for root beer floats also, as the handles are reasonably sturdy. I would recommend them highly for tea, coffee and floats and with mild reservation for very firm ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: EJP43

customer_reviews.title: good for handling sugar cubes for teas and coffee and ...
customer_reviews.text: as most folks mentioned, it's small. actual item is around 2.5-3 inches. good for handling sugar cubes for teas and coffee and nothing else. certainly looks good and material feels sturdy. if not for the low price, wont have gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking smooth polished finish
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of espresso spoons. Very nice looking smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy from KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for tall glassed.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for a set of tall glasses. These spoons are solidly made of 18/10 stainless steel with a bright polished finish. The spoons fit well in the relatively narrow bottom of the glasses. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are cute, I bought them for my 1 year old baby to use them as baby spoons, I wished they could be a little bit bigger, I guess it will work better for an infant more than a toddler.the handle is just to narrow for my toddlers hand.but they are cute and do the job
customer_reviews.author: Patricia w.

customer_reviews.title: They're Spoons - Pretty and Useful
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream spoons are just like the iced tea spoons, except the spoon is a little "rounder" than the iced tea spoon, which is more oblong. Pretty, sleek, useful. You might be surprised at how often you find yourself reaching (or looking for) long-handled spoons or utensils. Packaged well for shipping to protect from scratching, bending or crushing.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Person

customer_reviews.title: Small but beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Yep, they're small but high quality. Nice polished finish. For a teacup they are just the right size that you don't need to worry about them getting lost in the cup. It is about the same height as my fiestaware Java mug when left in the mug (a half inch taller held up straight).
customer_reviews.author: KJ954

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are small spoons--too short for being multipurpose, but they will work in a small tea/espresso cup, or for dessert in a ramekin or shooter glass. They are fun to have, but definitely not necessary. Buy them if you want just a sweet little extra to make you happy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Cute spoons, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cute spoons, just know that they are small, not standard size spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you know they are really small. 😁 they are espresso spoons
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice cream spoons
customer_reviews.text: Not necessary to have these spoons but if you already sprung for the sundae glasses, why skip any of the details. Good buy. They worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Nonomex

customer_reviews.title: Good for feeding baby if you want to stay away from plastic
customer_reviews.text: I use these spoons for feeding my baby as I try to stay away from plastic as much as possible. They fit very well in his tiny mouth. But I am already planning how else I can use them later
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used these spoons for Espresso and dessert during the holiday season. These are dish-washer safe. The packaging and shipment was good as well. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are sturdy and polished nicely. Cost less than other similar spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: We like them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these spoons. Pretty basic, they are spoons...they are good for tea, milk shakes, getting to the bottom of a narrow condiment jar. I don't put them in the dishwasher, don't know if you can. They are holding up well so far after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: pilesoflaundry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I thought. It will work for a sugar cube.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Handy little spoons
customer_reviews.text: Having tiny little spoons can be useful for a variety of reasons. I bought these to measure and stir matcha tea. I am very satisfied with them, though the person who washes the most dishes at home has pointed out on more than one occasion that they're too small to be washed in the dishware. Mea culpa.
customer_reviews.author: An Ominous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cool espresso spoons. Smooth design and good quality. Recommend hand wash so u don't loose em.
customer_reviews.author: T. Law

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for espressos! no issues ! this is my second set as my kids let some of them go into the food disposer and got dinged up so I had to replace them..
customer_reviews.author: DMexican

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple, little spoons
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed one, which I use for my sugar jar on the counter top, but having extras is no big deal. They match my other silverware, in by that I mean that they are simple and devoid of a lot of ugly design and detail that a lot of other silverware has.
customer_reviews.author: Koozie

product_meta.title: WMF Manaos/Bistro Grapefruit Spoon, Set of 4
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Grapefruit SpoonsLeave frippery behind and embrace stylish, modern functionality with the WMF Bistro flatware line. Created by Peter Baurle for everyday dining or casual entertaining, Bistro is crafted from tarnish-resistant 18/10 stainless steel with a high-polish mirror finish. Its handles feature rounded sides, slender necks, and gentle flares, capped by slight facets at the tips. Proportions and weight are comfortable, and the working ends have a contemporary style without sacrificing purpose. To allow for a perfectly customized collection, Bistro pieces are sold open stock with a wide selection of place setting pieces and serveware. 

The Bistro grapefruit spoon is an elegant as well as practical design, with a slightly serrated bowl that is effective on citrus and gentle on mouths. A great addition to a Bistro set or an existing flatware collection, the spoon is packaged here in a set of four. For simple cleanup and maintenance, it is dishwasher-safe and retains its gleam without polishing.
feature_bullets: 4-piece set of Bistro serrated grapefruit spoons; designed by Peter Baurle
Crafted from 18/10 stainless steel with a high-polish finish
Styling blends slender necks with flared handles and faceted tips
Working ends are modern, functional, and comfortable
Dishwasher-safe; full range of coordinating Bistro pieces available

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,606 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
